name: user-actions
description: Serverless CRUD services exposing a REST HTTP interface

scripts.deploy:groups: npm install && sls deploy --stage cis --aws-profile cis
scripts.invoke-lambda-createGroups: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_groupsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://data/create-groups.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-listGroups: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_listGroupsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://data/list-groups.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.invoke-lambda-getGroups: aws --profile cis lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_getGroupsFunctionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://data/get-groups.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
